head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Brooklyn: Driver Charged In Death

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Brooklyn: Driver Charged In Death

body.head.byline: By JENNIFER 8. LEE; Compiled by John Sullivan

abstract.p: Shiraz Sanjana from Princeton, NJ, is charged with driving without license after his vehicle kills motorcyclist in Brooklyn (S)

block.p: A man from Princeton, N.J., was arrested and charged with driving without a license after his vehicle killed a motorcyclist in Brooklyn yesterday, the police said. Shiraz Sanjana, 47, was driving north on Ocean Avenue near Avenue R shortly after 2 p.m. when he suddenly made a U-turn and hit Syed Adil Zaidi, 21, of Brooklyn, who was going south on his motorcycle, the authorities said. Mr. Zaidi was was declared dead on arrival at a local hospital. Mr. Sanjana was charged with aggravated unlicensed operation of a motor vehicle and driving without a license.

A man from Princeton, N.J., was arrested and charged with driving without a license after his vehicle killed a motorcyclist in Brooklyn yesterday, the police said. Shiraz Sanjana, 47, was driving north on Ocean Avenue near Avenue R shortly after 2 p.m. when he suddenly made a U-turn and hit Syed Adil Zaidi, 21, of Brooklyn, who was going south on his motorcycle, the authorities said. Mr. Zaidi was was declared dead on arrival at a local hospital. Mr. Sanjana was charged with aggravated unlicensed operation of a motor vehicle and driving without a license.
